title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1001.2 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1001.2 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part, governing public access to certain records of
the authority, is promulgated solely for the purpose of implementing the
provisions of the Freedom of Information Law. Nothing in this Part shall be
deemed to require the authority to reduce any information to physical form or
prepare any record not possessed or maintained by it, except the records
specified in section
1001.5
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1001.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
